headline: UPS Class Action News: Robbins LLP Reminds Investors of Quickly Approaching Lead Plaintiff Deadline in the United Parcel Service, Inc. Class Action
summary: SAN DIEGO, Nov. 25, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Robbins LLP reminds investors that a class action was filed on behalf of all persons and entities who purchased or otherwise acquired United Parcel Service,...

headline: Is UPS Stock Worth a Bet on Its Industry-Beating Dividend Yield?
summary: UPS's efforts to reward its shareholders bode well. High labor costs and below-par shipping activity represent key headwinds.

headline: SEC hits UPS with $45M fine for material misstatements
summary: The company overvalued its freight unit, one of its ‘worst-performing’ business segments, prior to the unit’s sale in 2021 for $800 million, the SEC said.

raw.headline: SEC hits UPS with $45M fine for material misstatements

headline: SEC-UPS to Pay $45 Million Penalty for Improperly Valuing Business Unit
summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission today announced settled charges against United Parcel Service Inc. for materially misrepresenting its earnings because it failed to follow generally accepted...
